edu.psu.compbio.seqcode.gse.projects.readdb
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  edu.psu.compbio.seqcode.gse.projects.readdb.Server

public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

ReadDB server class. Provides configuration-type information, but pushes all the request handling off onto ServerTask. Usage: 

java edu.psu.compbio.seqcode.gse.projects.readdb.Server --datadir /path/to/data

Optional parameters

  • --port 52000 port to listen on
  • --threads 5 number of threads to start to handle client requests
  • --cachesize 100 number of chromosomes to keep files open for
  • --maxconn 200 maximum number of client connections
  • --sleepiness 2 how sleepy the server should be waiting for input. Lower values use more CPU but improve responsiveness
  • --help print the usage message and exit

    isAdmin

    public boolean isAdmin(java.lang.String username)
    Returns true iff this princ is a server admin. Server admins can shut the server down. Currently implemented as members of the admin group.

    readGroupsFile

    public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> readGroupsFile()
                                                                               throws java.io.IOException
    The groups file has lines of the form groupname:user1 user2 user3 @othergroup user4 Group names that are also usernames are removed since ACLs can contain either users or groups and we don't want confusion.

    Throws:
    java.io.IOException
